## ModelInfoCompiler.write() method

Write artifacts from a successful compile to disk, via callbacks methods. The artifacts written may include:

- .model\_info file - metadata file used by keyman.com

**Signature:**

```typescript
write(artifacts: ModelInfoCompilerArtifacts): Promise<boolean>;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

artifacts


</td><td>

[ModelInfoCompilerArtifacts](./kmc-model-info.modelinfocompilerartifacts.md)


</td><td>

object containing artifact binary data to write out


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

true on success
